body.name: Indoor Camera 2K, Litokam 360 Pan/Tilt Smart Home Security Camera for Pets/Dog with Phone App, Baby Camera with Motion Detection, 2.4G WiFi Camera with Night Vision & 2-Way Audio, Works with Alexa
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 1 hr 6 mins
features: 【Smart Motion Detection & Tracking】Litokam security camera indoor equipped with advanced IR motion detection and smart tracking, which can smart tracking the activity. When motion detected, our indoor camera will quickly send the alert notifications to your mobile phone, help you keep an eyes on your home security anywhere & any time.

【360°Auto Rotation & 6 Preset Favorites Cruise】This home security camera can auto rotation with horizontal 360° and vertical 110°, help you monitor every angle of any room, no blind spot. You can preset favorite spot (up to 6) for fast cruise positioning, which can provide you a more flexible view for home security.

【2K Full HD & Clear IR Night Vision】With 2K full HD resolution, the baby camera displays a clear smooth live video, make sure you can accurately see what is happening at home. Built in 8 IR-LEDs and auto-sensing activated night vision, the nanny camera capture clearly night videos( up to 33ft), and can remotely monitor your baby room in complete darkness.

【2-Way Audio & Multiple Shared Views】The wifi security camera built-in noise-proof mic & speaker, you can clearly hear and talk with your family anywhere. The pet camera supports multiple users (no limit accounts number) to share views via littlelf smart phone app on iPhone and Android. Your baby pet will not be alone.

【Work with Alexa & Easy to Use】The wireless ip camera is compatible with 2.4GHz wifi network (not support to 5GHz ), please ensure a strong signal for reliable network performance. Works with Alexa, activate the APP capability on your Amazon Alexa app and connect the APP to Alexa for displaying the live feed of your home camera directly on the screen of your Echo Show.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use, clear video, & peace of mind
reviews.reviewText: Our dog is typically kept in her crate while alone in our home but since buying this product she has been happily roaming about, though kept in one room, she is free to play with her toys, lounge on the couch, and look out the window. Being able to talk to her through the camera is also very helpful as this helps to ease her anxiety throughout the work day. The product is easy to set up taking minutes to install the comparable app and connect to WiFi. It works great no matter how far we are from our home as long as we have access to internet connection. The picture is clear and the rotating camera allows us to follow our doggo wherever she may roam. 5/5! I am definitely buying more to install throughout our home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was super excited to order this camera for our house. I read all the great views, and I will say it definitely was worth every penny. The camera has a crisp look, the images are clear, and they were really easy to install! We did have to buy an extended USB cord in order to install it high up where we wanted.Overall, amazing camera! We are already looking to order an outside camera to add to the two we have. 😍😍😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera to keep an eye on our new foster dog while she is crated at night and during the day while we are at work. I love it! It is super easy to set up and only took about 10 minutes. Picture/video quality is good, and I love that it has motion detection and the ability to speak through the camera via the microphone feature. The only negative aspect is that it needs to be plugged into an outlet to work, so that limits places it can be set up. It also lags slightly sometimes, but other than that, it is an amazing product for such a low price point! Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for interior security
reviews.reviewText: This little camera works excellent for indoor security! It records events, notifies you of movement/people, and can even track foreign movements on a patrol mode when you’re not able to manually check the app. I haven’t had any problems with the camera itself or the app, and both have been extremely reliable! I have gotten other cheaper cameras to use at home before, and none of them compare to this one. The picture, audio, and interface is near pristine and very straight forward to use. I recommend this to anyone, but especially to those who might typically have a little more trouble using technology like this. You can get your camera set up, and you’re pretty much good to go from there on out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Camera! Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this camera to meet a novel purpose. We recently took in a stray cat to rescue her from the cold weather and dangers that she would inherently meet outdoors. She is not yet tame and hides in the room we have provided for her. With this camera we can check in to monitor her movements with hope she will become less fearful and explore her environment. With its 360 degree rotation we get a great view of of her room.The accompanying app allows us to connect through Wi-Fi. As opposed to other more expensive cameras we have used, entering this app gives an almost immediate connection. The app also pings whenever it detects movement which gives up to the second notifications of her movements. We are currently using the provided slot to record captured videos onto a micro SD card. A card is not included, but can be easily purchased. If you prefer the camera does offer cloud storage with various purchase plans.We plan to use another camera in the same room to give an even more expansive view of her room. We are very happy with this purchase not only because of its quality, but because of its great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality, easy to use and at a low price.
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these cameras for when my daughters come so we can check on the babies while napping. We set them up in two different areas and they worked perfectly. We all had the app and would get a notification when the babies woke up. They were easy to name so we knew which was which. After they left my Father-In-Law came to visit, he has Alzheimer’s and needs to be checked on from time to time. We were able to move the cameras and rename them very easily We now know when he’s up and walking around. Definitely easy to use, great picture quality and low cost! My husband wants to buy a few more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this camera to keep an eye on my dogs. The picture quality is amazing and the motion/sound detection is very sensitive. The app allows you to move the camera so you can view the room and you can also talk. Only thing I would like - that this doesn't have - is an on/off button. To turn it off, it needs to be unplugged. Easily connected to WiFi and was easy to set up. Incredible camera for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the price but night images are grainy
reviews.reviewText: I now have 3 WiFi security cameras, this, the Wyze V3, and a Vimtag, the latter two being 1k, in/out and without TPZ. I basically like this one and got it for the 2k and TPZ feature, and on the whole it's worked out well for me. I really like being able to move the lens around and zoom in when I notice something questionable outside.Since it's not rated for outdoor use I mounted it inside upside down near the top of a window, which has worked well other than not being able to use its nighttime IR due to window reflection. Perhaps because of that nighttime images are grainy and noisy, but still usable for security purposes. During the day images are fairly sharp and clean, but still not sharp enough to make out license plates.My only other complaint is that there's no PC app and you have to use their browser app, which is very basic and but gets the job done. For the $20 I paid for it I can't really complain though. I'll eventually get around to either buying a 4k camera or set up a Raspberry Pi for that since it has a 4k camera. Recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Camera with economical price and satisfy your needs
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Little Elf Indoor Camera, and I couldn't be happier with it. The setup was a breeze, and the video quality is excellent. I love the convenience of being able to check in on my home from anywhere using the mobile app. The motion detection feature works like a charm, and it gives me peace of mind knowing that my home is secure. The compact design of the camera blends seamlessly with my decor, making it a discreet addition to my living space. Overall, the Little Elf Indoor Camera is a fantastic addition to my home security setup, and I highly recommend it!

Bin positiv überrascht über die Qualität und die Funktionalität für den Preis. Habe das Einrichten gut hinbekommen und zur Überwachung vom Hund sind die Bilder super. Auch die Nachtsicht ist überraschend gut. Die Beweglichkeit und die Sprachfunktion sind auch dabei und funktionieren super. Bin wirklich begeistert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Easy setup, easy to share pictures, works really well.
reviews.reviewText: I had a few problems with the cameras going offline which I solved by improving the WiFi signal. The camera gives a reading of signal strength and I found you need at least 70% to keep the camera online. The camera is great looking up and ahead. If you want to look down I recommend you use the bracket provided and wall mount it. Overall a very good buy for the price.Bought these to keep an eye on our new cats, mum and kitten. They were found living wild under a patio in Gloucester and rescued by Cats Rescue. They are very timid but watching them settle in here has been a joy. These cameras have been a GREAT purchase and the night vision is AWESOME.
